feed.title: WeKan Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.65
entry.content:
This release fixes the following bugs:

  • Revert some scrollbar, sidebar and list width changes. Thanks to xet7.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.67
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Re-introduce list auto-width feature, Reverted scrollbar hiding, Fixed transparent sidebar bug. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.68
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Speed improvements to building WeKan x86_64 Dockerfile. Using Ubuntu 24.04 Docker base image. Thanks to NadavTasher.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.69
entry.content:
This release adds the following updates:

  • Bump docker/metadata-action from 5.5.1 to 5.6.1. Thanks to dependabot.
  • Updated dependencies. Thanks to developers of dependencies.
  • Updated Windows docs. Thanks to xet7.
  • Update docker-compose.yml Keycloak part. Thanks to NadavTasher.
  • Updated Keycloak etc login settings at start-wekan.bat and start-wekan.sh. Thanks to xet7.
  • Updated release scripts. Thanks to xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Fix issue with comments not showing when using Exodark Theme. Thanks to walster001.
  • Change archive-card shortcut to backtick for better ergonomics. Thanks to malteprang.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.

entry.title: New release for WeKan: v7.70
entry.content:
This release adds the following new features:

  • Helm Chart: Allow to define securityContext for pod and containers. Thanks to maitredede.
  • Move card to archive, add shortcut key รท for Persian keyboard. Thanks to mohammadZahedian and xet7.

and fixes the following bugs:

  • Helm Chart: Service account token does not need to be mounted in op. Thanks to maitredede.

Thanks to above GitHub users for their contributions and translators for their translations.
